headline: Landstar Appoints Chief Human Resources Officer
summary: JACKSONVILLE, Fla., Feb. 02, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Landstar System, Inc. (NASDAQ: LSTR), a technology-enabled, asset-light provider of integrated transportation management solutions delivering safe, specialized transportation services, has named Ms. Terri Lewis as Chief Human Resources Officer (CHRO), effective February 23, 2026. Lewis has over twenty-five years of human resources leadership experience in both the public and private sectors. Most recently, she served as Chief People Officer a
